report.name: profilRess

userParameter.name: P_PARAM9
userParameter.initialValue: Suivi d'activité / budget;Suivi financier / Comptable - Détail

dataSource.name: Q_RESSOURCES
dataSource.select:
SELECT r.ident ress_code, r.rnom ress_nom, r.rprenom ress_prenom, situ.codsg ress_dpg, situ.datsitu ress_datedeb, situ.datdep ress_datefin, situ.prestation ress_presta FROM situ_ress situ, datdebex d, ressource r, (SELECT MAX (datsitu) datsitu, ident, cpident FROM situ_ress, datdebex d WHERE datsitu <= SYSDATE AND (datdep IS NULL OR datdep >= d.datdebex) GROUP BY ident, cpident) situ1 WHERE situ.datsitu = situ1.datsitu AND situ.ident = situ1.ident AND situ.cpident = situ1.cpident AND situ.ident = r.ident
&P_WHERE ORDER BY r.rnom

dataSource.name: Q_CP
dataSource.select: select unique r.ident cp_r_ident, r.rnom cp_r_nom, r.rprenom cp_r_prenom from ressource r where r.ident =lpad(to_char(:P_PARAM6),5,'0')

dataSource.name: Q_LIGNE
dataSource.select: select distinct bip.pid ligne_code, bip.TYPPROJ ligne_type, bip.ASTATUT ligne_statut, bip.ADATESTATUT ligne_date_statut, bip.TOPFER ligne_topfer, conso.CUSAG ligne_conso, b.REESTIME ligne_reestime, b.ANMONT ligne_arbitre, b.BPMONTME ligne_propose_fournisseur, b.BPMONTMO ligne_propose_client, bip.CODSG ligne_dpg from ligne_bip bip, consomme conso, budget b where INSTR(:P_CHEF_PROJET, TO_CHAR(bip.pcpi, 'FM00000') ) > 0 and conso.pid(+) = bip.PID and conso.annee(+) = to_char(:P_DATDEBEX, 'YYYY') and b.pid(+) = bip.PID and b.annee(+) = to_char(:P_DATDEBEX, 'YYYY') and ( (bip.ADATESTATUT is NULL) or (bip.ADATESTATUT >= :P_DATDEBEX)) order by bip.pid

dataSource.name: Q_RESSOURCES_FAV
dataSource.select:
SELECT DECODE(fav.IDENT,NULL,'','F') fav1, r.ident ress_code, r.rnom ress_nom, r.rprenom ress_prenom, situ.codsg ress_dpg, situ.datsitu ress_datedeb, situ.datdep ress_datefin, situ.prestation ress_presta FROM situ_ress situ, datdebex d, (SELECT MAX (datsitu) datsitu, ident, cpident FROM situ_ress, datdebex d WHERE datsitu <= SYSDATE AND (datdep IS NULL OR datdep >= d.datdebex) GROUP BY ident, cpident) situ1, ressource r LEFT OUTER JOIN ISAC_RESSOURCE_FAVORITE fav ON ( r.IDENT = fav.IDENT AND UPPER(fav.IDARPEGE) = UPPER(:P_USER_RTFE) ) WHERE situ.datsitu = situ1.datsitu AND situ.ident = situ1.ident AND situ.cpident = situ1.cpident AND situ.ident = r.ident
&P_WHERE
ORDER BY r.rnom

textSegment.string: Ressources rattachées directement (D) ou indirectement, au sens de la Saisie directe :
Ressources rattachées directement (D) ou indirectement, au sens de la Saisie directe :
Lignes rattachées, au sens de la Saisie directe :
PROFIL SAISIE DIRECTE DE LA RESSOURCE
